Changelog
=========

1.3.0 (2018-09-28)
------------------

- Fix error when uploading a tarball in portal_setup. [jone]
- Add plone 5.1.x test cfg. [mathias.leimgruber]

------------------

- Fix compatibility with ftw.inflator. [jone]


1.2.0 (2016-05-11)
------------------

- Support before-import hooks. [jone]


1.0.0 (2014-08-15)
------------------

- Initial implementation.
  [jone]
